about_the_game:
Take on the role of Henry Barrington, a returning pirate captain, in this immersive roguelite. Your quest for wealth and glory has led you to the far reaches of the Caribbean in search of the legendary Mapoya treasure.




Explore the depths of the ocean to discover a wealth of precious metals and equipment, then resurface to defend your vessel against increasingly challenging attacks using a variety of skills. Upgrade and repair your ship to venture even further into the seas!


Meet colorful and mysterious characters. Between betrayals, unlikely alliances, and surprising revelations, this adventure may prove to be more dangerous than anticipated...




Collect relics, but beware of curses that may lead to your downfall. However, death does not mean the end. Return to the mysterious island of Iticali and set sail once more to seize the cursed treasure of Mapoya.




  • A accessible Roguelite set in an exciting pirate universe.
  • Explore the depths of the sea in search of precious metals to continuously upgrade your pirate galleon.
  • Naval battles that require reflexes and strategy.
  • Dozens of unique curses and relics that will affect each of your playthroughs.
  • Hand-drawn visuals, a rich sound landscape, and attention to detail and immersion.

short_description: Pirates: Rise of Thieves is a roguelite exploration and survival game. You're a pirate who explores the seabed to find as many resources as possible, before having to go up to defend his boat from attacks. You have access to a multitude of improvements to optimize each of your run.
